00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00030 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00031 
00032 // privileges checking
00033 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('reporting', 'r');
00034 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('reporting', 'w');
00035 
00036 if (!$can_read) {
00037     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to access this area!').'</div>');
00038 }
00039 
00040 /* loan report */
00041 $table = new simbio_table();
00042 $table->table_attr = 'align="center" class="border" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00043 
00044 // total number of loan transaction
00045 $report_query = $dbs->query('SELECT COUNT(loan_id) FROM loan');
00046 $report_data = $report_query->fetch_row();
00047 $loan_report[__('Total Loan')] = $report_data[0];
00048 
00049 // total number of loan transaction by GMD/medium
00050 $report_query = $dbs->query('SELECT gmd_name, COUNT(loan_id) FROM loan AS l
00051     INNER JOIN item AS i ON l.item_code=i.item_code
00052     INNER JOIN biblio AS b ON i.biblio_id=b.biblio_id
00053     INNER JOIN mst_gmd AS gmd ON b.gmd_id=gmd.gmd_id
00054     GROUP BY b.gmd_id ORDER BY COUNT(loan_id) DESC');
00055 $report_data = '';
00056 while ($data = $report_query->fetch_row()) {
00057     $report_data .= '<strong>'.$data[0].'</strong> : '.$data[1].', ';
00058 }
00059 $loan_report[__('Total Loan By GMD/Medium')] = $report_data;
00060 
00061 // total number of loan transaction by Collection type
00062 $report_query = $dbs->query('SELECT coll_type_name, COUNT(loan_id) FROM loan AS l
00063     INNER JOIN item AS i ON l.item_code=i.item_code
00064     INNER JOIN mst_coll_type AS ct ON i.coll_type_id=ct.coll_type_id
00065     GROUP BY i.coll_type_id ORDER BY COUNT(loan_id) DESC');
00066 $report_data = '';
00067 while ($data = $report_query->fetch_row()) {
00068     $report_data .= '<strong>'.$data[0].'</strong> : '.$data[1].', ';
00069 }
00070 $loan_report[__('Total Loan By Collection Type')] = $report_data;
00071 
00072 // total number of loan transaction
00073 $report_query = $dbs->query('SELECT COUNT(loan_id)
00074     FROM loan
00075     GROUP BY member_id, loan_date
00076     ORDER BY `COUNT(loan_id)` DESC');
00077 $report_data = $report_query->num_rows;
00078 $loan_report[__('Total Loan Transactions')] = $report_data;
00079 $peak_transaction_data = $report_query->fetch_row();
00080 
00081 // transaction average per day
00082 $total_loan_days_query = $dbs->query('SELECT DISTINCT loan_date FROM loan');
00083 $total_loan_days = $total_loan_days_query->num_rows;
00084 $loan_report[__('Transaction Average (Per Day)')] = @ceil($loan_report[__('Total Loan Transactions')]/$total_loan_days);
00085 
00086 // peak transaction
00087 $loan_report[__('Total Peak Transaction')] = $peak_transaction_data[0];
00088 
00089 // total members having loans
00090 $report_query = $dbs->query('SELECT DISTINCT member_id FROM loan');
00091 $report_data = $report_query->num_rows;
00092 $loan_report[__('Members Already Had Loans')] = $report_data;
00093 
00094 // total members having loans
00095 // get total member that already not expired
00096 $total_members_query = $dbs->query('SELECT COUNT(member_id) FROM member
00097     WHERE TO_DAYS(expire_date)>TO_DAYS(\''.date('Y-m-d').'\')');
00098 $total_members_data = $total_members_query->fetch_row();
00099 $loan_report[__('Members Never Have Loans Yet')] = $total_members_data[0]-$loan_report[__('Members Already Had Loans')];
00100 
00101 // total overdued loand
00102 $report_query = $dbs->query('SELECT COUNT(loan_id) FROM loan WHERE
00103     is_lent=1 AND is_return=0 AND TO_DAYS(due_date)>TO_DAYS(\''.date('Y-m-d').'\')');
00104 $report_data = $report_query->fetch_row();
00105 $loan_report[__('Total Overdued Loans')] = $report_data[0];
00106 
00107 // table header
00108 $table->setHeader(array(__('Loan Data Summary')));
00109 $table->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" colspan="3"';
00110 // initial row count
00111 $row = 1;
00112 foreach ($loan_report as $headings=>$report_data) {
00113     $table->appendTableRow(array($headings, ':', $report_data));
00114     // set cell attribute
00115     $table->setCellAttr($row, 0, 'class="alterCell" valign="top" style="width: 170px;"');
00116     $table->setCellAttr($row, 1, 'class="alterCell" valign="top" style="width: 1%;"');
00117     $table->setCellAttr($row, 2, 'class="alterCell2" valign="top" style="width: auto;"');
00118     // add row count
00119     $row++;
00120 }
00121 
00122 // if we are in print mode
00123 if (isset($_GET['print'])) {
00124     // html strings
00125     $html_str = '<html><head><title>'.$sysconf['library_name'].' Membership General Statistic Report</title>';
00126     $html_str .= '<style type="text/css">'."\n";
00127     $html_str .= 'body {padding: 0.2cm}'."\n";
00128     $html_str .= 'body * {color: black; font-size: 11pt;}'."\n";
00129     $html_str .= 'table {border: 1px solid #000000;}'."\n";
00130     $html_str .= '.dataListHeader {background-color: #000000; color: white; font-weight: bold;}'."\n";
00131     $html_str .= '.alterCell {border-bottom: 1px solid #666666; background-color: #CCCCCC;}'."\n";
00132     $html_str .= '.alterCell2 {border-bottom: 1px solid #666666; background-color: #FFFFFF;}'."\n";
00133     $html_str .= '</style>'."\n";
00134     $html_str .= '</head>';
00135     $html_str .= '<body>'."\n";
00136     $html_str .= '<h3>'.$sysconf['library_name'].' - '.__('Loan Report').'</h3>';
00137     $html_str .= '<hr size="1" />';
00138     $html_str .= $table->printTable();
00139     $html_str .= '<script type="text/javascript">self.print();</script>'."\n";
00140     $html_str .= '</body></html>';
00141     // write to file
00142     $file_write = @file_put_contents(REPORT_FILE_BASE_DIR.'loan_stat_print_result.html', $html_str);
00143     if ($file_write) {
00144         // open result in new window
00145         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.openWin(\''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'/'.FILES_DIR.'/'.REPORT_DIR.'/loan_stat_print_result.html\', \'popMemberReport\', 800, 500, true)</script>';
00146     } else { utility::jsAlert('ERROR! Loan statistic report failed to generate, possibly because '.REPORT_FILE_BASE_DIR.' directory is not writable'); }
00147     exit();
00148 }

00150 ?>

00153     <?php echo strtoupper(__('Loan Report')); ?>
